attributes.action: Allow Ukrainians to retain settled status until applying for citizenship
attributes.background: End the proposed plans to end Ukrainian visas on the 3rd year of residence and instead allow Ukrainians to stay in our nation until they can apply for citizenship or until the cessation of hostilities within Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700776
